Name: Sergeant PixelRay
Description: Sergeant PixelRay is a valiant member of the WebtrES Club, known for his steadfast dedication and strategic prowess. Assembled during the peak of the pixel wars, his laser screen was designed for swift communication and target acquisition. With classic box design and soldier buttons, he represents the merging of traditional craftsmanship and modern technology. His arms and legs are of the classic variety, but don't let that fool you — they are reinforced with code-enriched steel, allowing for remarkable agility and strength. Whether leading a group of code cadets or defending the digital realms, Sergeant PixelRay is always at the ready, his laser screen scanning for virtual threats and his presence inspiring confidence in his fellow digital entities.
